bibl.title: Researches on Papyrus Mounting with Japanese Paper Inlay.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: General principles of Japanese paper sheet preparation. - Use of multi-layered Japanese paper sheets with papyrus pasting. - Use of multi-layered Japanese paper sheets without papyrus pasting. - Prospects.
bibl.seg: Eve Menei, Researches on Papyrus Mounting with Japanese Paper Inlay.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 23 (2016) pp. 95-104, 11 figg. coul.

General principles of Japanese paper sheet preparation. - Use of multi-layered Japanese paper sheets with papyrus pasting. - Use of multi-layered Japanese paper sheets without papyrus pasting. - Prospects.
